goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 192 KB)
target: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency
un_custodian_agency: International Energy Agency (IEA) United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD) United Nations' inter-agency mechanism on energy (UN Energy) and the SE4ALL Global Tracking Framework Consortium
title: Untitled
indicator_name: Final consumption of primary energy, ktep
national_indicator_available: 7.3.1.a. Final consumption of primary energy, ktep
computation_calculations: Consumption of primary energy is gross internal consumption of energy, except for non-energetic uses.
computation_definitions: Internal gross consumption of energy resources represents the quantity of resulting energy summed up with the production of primary energy, of recovered products, of import and stock at the beginning of the period of reference minus export, bunkers and stocks at the end of the period of reference.
graph_title: 7.3.1.a. Final consumption of primary energy, ktep

ro.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 192 KB)
ro.un_custodian_agency: International Energy Agency (IEA) United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD) United Nations' inter-agency mechanism on energy (UN Energy) and the SE4ALL Global Tracking Framework Consortium
ro.title: Untitled
ro.target: Până în 2030, dublarea ratei globale de îmbunătățire a eficienței energetice
ro.indicator_name: Consum de energie primară  (consum intern brut)
ro.national_indicator_available: 7.3.1.a. Consum de energie primară  (consum intern brut)
ro.computation_calculations: Consumul de energie primară este  consum intern brut de energie, cu excepția utilizărilor neenergetice.
ro.computation_definitions: Consumul Intern Brut de resurse energetice reprezintă cantitatea de energie rezultată prin însumarea la producția de energie primară, a produselor recuperate, a importului și a stocului la începutul perioadei de referință din care se scad exportul, buncărajul și stocul la sfârșitul perioadei de referință.
ro.graph_title: 7.3.1.a. Consum de energie primară  (consum intern brut)
